title: Huge Russian Bayonet Charge: French Stand Firm - Napoleonic: Total War 3 Mod Gameplay
description:
This is a massive battle in Napoleonic: Total War 3!  It is a 4v4 and multiple factions are involved.  On one side we have an alliance of British, Russian, and Bavarian forces.  On the other, we have French, Prussian, and Polish forces.  This battle is back and forth, and comes down to the wire!  Enjoy the Battle!

Napoleonic: Total War 3 is a Mod for Napoleon Total War.


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
